messages.message: Is that a new necklace?
Yeah, Jack got it for me actually. He's so sweet.
You have a lot of new things, are they all from him?
Yeah they are, I've never been given this much. He treats me so well.
How have things been going with you two?
We moved to Kik, it's a chatroom and I've met some of his friends through it.
You're in the chatroom right now? What are you texting him?
Nothing, stop being so nosy.
Why'd he and his friends say GNOC, what does that mean?
Stop reading my messages, what's wrong with you?
Get naked on camera? You're really doing that for him and his friends?
I know you didn't want me to know but I googled GNOC and I'm not judging I just want to know if you're ok doing that for him and his friends.
What? Why'd you do that? I don't want to talk about that. It means something else.
I just want to be there for you. Just know I'd never judge you.
I don't know, sometimes it makes me feel really shameful
I don't know what he told you, but you always have a choice to stop if you don't feel comfortable.
I don't have a choice though...
What do you mean? Did he threaten you or something?
PHYSICAL, PSYCHOLOGICAL, AND SEXUAL THREATS ARE USED TO COERCE AND CONTROL VICTIMS
I guess, it's embarrassing to say, you wouldn't understand.
No, it's not, help me to understand then. I'll never judge you, you don't have to ever feel shame telling me these things.
He has private photos and videos of me. It's my fault, I shouldn't have ever let him have those.
It's not your fault, you're a teenager and I'm pretty sure he's an adult, not a teen like he said.
TRAFFICKERS OFTEN FAKE THEIR IDENTITIES ONLINE TO RECRUIT VICTIMS
He's the one who should know better. Is he threatening to leak the photos if you tell someone?
Yes, please don't tell anyone. My life will be over.
I won't say anything if you don't want that. But I want you to know that what he's doing is wrong and illegal.
There are people you can talk to, only if you want to, and we can talk to them together and they can stop him from making you do these things.
I don’t know if I want to tell any adults right now though. I don’t think they’d understand.
You can talk to professionals who know how to help you get out of this situation, they'll understand.
The human trafficking hotline is completely confidential. You don't have to worry about anything, you're not alone.
Ok, I'll talk to them.
NEW MATERIAL POSSESSIONS ARE AN INDICATOR OF TRAFFICKING
GNOC MEANING "GET NAKED ON CAMERA" IS ONE OF MANY CODE PHRASES USED IN TRAFFICKING CHATROOMS
CHATROOMS ARE A COMMON PLACE FOR TRAFFICKERS TO COMMUNICATE WITH VICTIMS
